title: screen on the top right hand corner
body: I tried changing my resolution and nothing happen. Every time I update I always get a new problem. >;( I have a mac btw.

replies.body:
Looking into this issue to figure out what's going on!  As some have mentioned here, Alt+Enter will toggle you into windowed mode and restore your screen.  To help gather more information here, can you tell me what in-game resolution you're at?  A screenshot of your drop down options for your resolution could help too!

I want to confirm if the origin of the issue here might be using custom resolutions, or those exceeding 1080p.  Let me know!

iMac OS X 10.12.4 27" native resolution on Mac

Tried running different resolutions in game including low 1024x768 - same problems
Thanks. I just updated client and am experiencing this problem as well. Also using a mac. Eagerly awaiting a fix!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oITa0zEE,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-05-03T16:25:21.831+0000)
>
> Looking into this issue to figure out what's going on!  As some have mentioned here, Alt+Enter will toggle you into windowed mode and restore your screen.  To help gather more information here, can you tell me what in-game resolution you're at?  A screenshot of your drop down options for your resolution could help too!
> 
> I want to confirm if the origin of the issue here might be using custom resolutions, or those exceeding 1080p.  Let me know!

I have sent in a bug report for this exact issue. Any help would be SUPER appreciated!

I've fixed the issue!! Im on a MacBook retina 13". Go into system preferences > displays and choose scaled then choose the one that has no text under it its the display thats a touch smaller then the default. If you look under the computer icon to the right it will say looks like 1440 x 900. Then play a game and enjoy the full screen experience :)
Any updates on this issue because it's really bugging me and making me preform badly
Same here. Macbook pro 15 inch retina.

> [{quoted}](name=Accurateelf,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oITa0zEE,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-03T12:49:28.891+0000)
>
> I tried changing my resolution and nothing happen. Every time I update I always get a new problem. &gt;;( I have a mac btw.

I just updated and my screen only shows on the top right? What do i do?
the same happened to me what do i do

I have this issue, too. I think my res is something low like 1024x800

2015 MBPro 13" retina running MacOS Sierra 10.12.4
Switching to 'windowed mode' is working.  but so annoying..... please fix.
you can change back to full screen mode in the setting and it works fine

MAC USERS

If you switch to windowed mode and back, it fixes the problem. If you switch to windowed mode and back and see the black bar, thats just where your dock is supposed to be. If you go to your settings and toggle the box to "automatically hide or show the dock", the black bar disappears when you go back in game and it works normally. Not a full fix but it works for now! :)

I'm having the same issue.  

Every since the Client updated, I have had client crash issues while in game.  Eventually, my client reverted back to an older version to fix itself.  After the most recent update, my in-game client has the screen stuck in the top right corner.  The emblem at the bottom shows the old League of Legends logo.  I wonder if using the older setup is somehow no longer compatible with the most recent version of the new client.
Okay I found a way. change your resolution from your mac not in league.  it worked for me.
iMac Retina 27" - no way to change resolution, you are likely running a laptop

that does not worked i have tried 
{{item:3117}}
What are you changing your resolution to?  If it's custom or too big then it could continue to reproduce the same issue.
Same thing here. alt+enter helps but I'd really rather not be playing in windowed mode. Also using a Mac. Help is greatly appreciated.

This is the workaround for now,  though I know it's not ideal if it's not the preferred setting.  Are you using a custom resolution?  If so, are you able to change it to a standard setting via video options after switching to Windowed mode?  I'll keep my eyes on this issues and check for updates regularly.  Hang tight!

For me 1280 800 was a setting that was standard when i downloaded the game. It was just setted to that when I started. Ifeel most comfortable with that too. If i make the resolution to like 2150 it just doesnt work out with me. Cursors too slow and stuff. Maybe its cause im playing with laptop. 1280 800 setting works totally fine in window mode but always shifted in full screen mode. Other resolution seems like it doesnt have problem for me. Full screen and no prob. Ah and also the screen shifts since the pick loading screen if the resolution is 1280

Exactly have this issue. I try to fix this by first moving the option screen that comes out when u press esc, so you can see it and changed the screen to window. If I change back to full screen, It's kinda fixed but pushed bit upward. So I can't see the top part like cs time kda and stuffs. It works totally fine for other resolutions, but I get this problem when I'm only in 1280 * 800. It is ok if I go up one more or one down in resolution, but I feel most comfortable with 1280 * 800 resolution, so I wish I can use this setting. :( I use 13' macbook

iMac Retina 27" Late 2015 running OS X 10.12.4

Same issue with game window appearing top right corner with the updated LOL Client. 

The CMD+OPTION+ENTER keys work, but when full screen the top scrolling in game is not working. When windowed the scrolling is working in all directions.

Please fix bugs....
Yeah the top scrolling doesn't work for me either unless I use windowed mode. Windowed mode is annoying af though and super laggy.
I had the same problem. alt + enter partially fixes the issue.
how do i change my resolution
what do i change it to
same here pls help
Yes I have a mac too.  The same thing is happening to me
I'm using a mac too, and i can only see the bottom left part of the game. It's been shifted up and right and the rest is black.
Got the same thing. I even tried playing with it for a couple of minutes. Didn't work out too well.
Using a mac as well, got the same problem. Changed between windowed, borderless, full screen but that doesn't seem to do anything.
I'm having the same problem, so annoying
